r.d: OS independet wrapper class for executing ping calls
r.n: * Fix Bug #2006: Invalid ping arguments for RH9 [cconstantine] * Fix Bug #10788: Net_Ping::ping() multiple calls pile up output in results buffer [cconstantine] * Fix Bug #11395: Fails to pass arguments when $_system=openbsd [cconstantine] * Implement Feature #11231: convert to package XML v2 [cconstantine]
